Lola Travel https://www.lolatravel.com/ | Boston, MA, USA | Full-time, ONSITE | Front-end / Node.js / JavaScript software engineers

Lola is a modern travel agency. We are trying to bring humans back into travel planning. We are a 24/7 chat-app using real live travel agents, assisted by AI and a very sophisticated back-end control panel to help them efficiently plan the best trips possible.

Our front-end uses React, Node, and soon a React-Native stack to build tools for our travel agents.

We are well-funded, and are approximately 50 people and growing quickly. Our founder is Paul English, co-founder of Kayak.com.

Email james@lolatravel.com if interested
